description: Skopeo - tool for working with remote container image registries

common_errors.cause: Not authenticated or invalid credentials for registry
common_errors.solution: Run 'skopeo login' with valid credentials, check authfile location

common_errors.cause: Image or tag does not exist in the registry
common_errors.solution: Verify image name and tag, use 'skopeo list-tags' to see available tags

common_errors.cause: Invalid or unsupported image transport specified
common_errors.solution: Use valid transport prefix: docker://, dir:, oci:, containers-storage:, docker-archive:
Use --tls-verify=false for self-signed certs (testing only), or add CA cert

common_errors.cause: Cannot establish network connection to registry
common_errors.solution: Check network connectivity, verify registry URL, check firewall rules
Check signature policy in /etc/containers/policy.json, verify signing keys
Check storage space, verify network stability, retry copy operation
Check destination path permissions, verify storage backend is accessible

common_errors.cause: Image does not have manifest for requested platform/architecture
common_errors.solution: Specify platform with --override-arch or --override-os, check available platforms
Verify image reference is correct, check authentication, try with --raw flag
